channel.title: Dust Off That Analog [Remix Competition] - Insolidarity
channel.description:
Hey Disco! I know at least a few of you have heard about @sn.ow.y and my collab ‚ÄúDust Off That Analog‚Äù (btw thanks for the immense support, 657 plays, 68 likes, 18 reposts, and 35 of your most encouraging comments). I‚Äôd like to announce that because of it‚Äôs popularity, I‚Äôm hosting a remix competition! Here are the parameters: * can be any genre remix * must not exceed 5 minutes * must include main melody (duh) * must be significantly different from the original (this is not a ‚Äúhere‚Äôs what I fixed‚Äù competition üòâ) * and must have fun!
I‚Äôll set a deadline when i get at least 7 interested parties
Here‚Äôs the track for reference: https://soundcloud.com/insolidaritymusic/dust-off-that-analog
And here‚Äôs the project: https://app.auxy.co/projects/HXzVCsz9E-lZlaiExu96ZQ==
Feel free to change whatever, the project will always be here
